entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:01 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
